Texts.Eng: Find ^orange;other types of bees^white;, and cross-breed them within. You never know what you'll end up with! I suggest searching for Forest Bees as soon as possible!

Now you need to ^orange;catch a queen and a drone honey bee^white; and let them loose inside your apiary. You'll need a ^orange;bug net^reset; for this. Bees can be found on most biomes, usually during the daylight hours.
